Crypto.py¶

job_monitoring_app.backend.app.internal.crypto.generate_apikey()¶

Generates a random API key :return: Random API key

job_monitoring_app.backend.app.internal.crypto.get_password_hash(password)¶

Returns the hashed password :param password: Password in plain text :return: Password in hashed form

job_monitoring_app.backend.app.internal.crypto.verify_password(plain_password, hashed_password)¶

Verifies the password :param plain_password: Password in plain text :param hashed_password: Password in hashed form :return: True if the password is correct, False otherwise
